title: 【Person Of Interest Fanvid】"The Red" Made By Dandan
author: 李丹
comment: One person came close to fixing Reese, and that was Joss Carter. She was his anchor in the storm. Thank you so much for making this beautiful video and sharing it with us. Your talent is remarkable!
description: Just my  complex mixed feeling after EP420. Although it's almost impossible, I do wish there's someone that can fix Reese. I love him so much, and can't bear seeing his vulnerabilities T^T BGM is Eason Chen's Red Rose
